meanings.sent1: The pending approval of the loan made him anxious.
meanings.sent2: The court case is still pending, so we have to wait.
meanings.sent3: The pending outcome of the game kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The pending storm clouds loomed ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pending results of the test left her feeling uncertain.

meanings.sent1: The pending issue caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: The pending contract negotiations are causing delays.
meanings.sent3: The pending decision on the menu left the chef scratching his head.
meanings.sent4: The pending question hung in the air, waiting for an answer.
meanings.sent5: The pending resolution of the conflict seemed elusive.

meanings.definition: About to happen or take place
meanings.sent1: The pending arrival of the guests prompted a flurry of activity.
meanings.sent2: The pending deadline for the project is approaching fast.
meanings.sent3: The pending party had everyone excited for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The pending sunrise painted the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The pending announcement kept everyone in suspense.
